Container¶

JavaScript¶

Plugins.fn.container_aspectratio(adjust, factor)¶

Keeps the aspect ratio of an element.

Arguments:
  • adjust (string) – "width" (width is adjusted to height) or "height" (height is adjusted to width)
  • factor (float) – The relative width. (adjusted = factor * other)
Returns:

An object providing enable and disable functions.
